bug.author: kazunarikudo
bug.summary: Actual acquisition frame rate is slower than the value AcquisitonFrameRate reports.
bug.description:
Describe the bug Actual acquisition frame rate is slower than the value AcquisitonFrameRate reports. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Launch Harvester GUI. Load MATRIX VISION's GenTL Producer for example. Connect a camera to Harvester. Start image acquisition. See measured acquisition frame rate that is displayed in the status bar.
Expected behavior Acquisition frame rate should equal the value that is reported by AcquisitionFrameRate.
